content.rendered:
Update – 1 February 2019: 
Since joining Fiverr, we’ve been able to unlock even more opportunities to help you focus on doing what you love, as we work together to advance our mission of changing how the world works together.
We invested a ton into the product to make it the best it can be for you. We launched over 97 updates and new features, created a desktop app and so much more.
Our highest priority is ensuring we’re able to keep bringing you the best possible product to help your business soar.
That’s why after a year of providing Fiverr Workspace entirely free, we’ve now introduced the Fiverr Workspace Pro plan.
The Pro plan starts at only $18/mo and we also keep a free plan for casual users. You can find out more here. 

Hey there, friends!
Today, we’re thrilled to share some big news: Fiverr Workspace is joining Fiverr, the leading global marketplace for creative and digital services, giving freelancers the resources they need to thrive in today’s always-on economy. Together, we’re committed to empowering the independent workforce and we’re proud to join Fiverr’s stellar team in this endeavor.
This decision was born out of a common belief across our two companies, which is that people do their best work when they can control their own destiny. By joining Fiverr, we’re able to unlock even more opportunities to help you focus on doing what you love, facilitating happier, more productive professional lifestyles that are built upon freedom, flexibility and damn good work.
Announcement: Fiverr Workspace joins Fiverr from Fiverr Workspace from Fiverr on Vimeo.

What this means for our members

It will be business as usual at AND CO, as we’ll continue to listen to you and develop and improve upon the tools you need to succeed. There’s also an added perk that we think you’ll like: effective immediately, we’ll be offering Fiverr Workspace for free.
Since launching, we’ve been diligently committed to optimizing our product to meet the evolving needs of the freelance community, aka you guys. We’ve emailed with you, chatted with you via our Chief Operators (COs), had calls and exchanged tweets—and all of your feedback has helped shape who we are today. We look forward to maintaining this close bond with our members.
Now a 60,000 members strong, Fiverr Workspace has a tremendous opportunity to extend our software to an even larger, more diverse, and more global community of freelancers. And of course, with the support of Fiverr’s incredible team and product, you can expect even bigger things to come from us in the coming months.
Fiverr Workspace + Fiverr:

The big picture

Fiverr is building the leading global freelance ecosystem—a mission that extends beyond simply allowing freelancers to source and secure their next Gig or get the services they need to grow their business. This next evolution in Fiverr’s own path is to deliver the end-to-end solutions needed to support today’s freelance economy, which includes offering intuitive and time-saving business and accounting tools that allow to you focus more time on what you love: the work.
In addition to acquiring AND CO, Fiverr has been hard at work building a comprehensive home for freelancers and entrepreneurs—no matter where they source and complete their projects. From expanded project opportunities (Fiverr Pro) and support tools like Fiverr Workspace to community events and training alliances, Fiverr is investing in all areas of the freelance life cycle.

More to come…

This is the first step of many to architect the go-to platform for modern-day freelancers, offering every tool, convenience and benefit possible to thrive. By joining the Fiverr team, we will continue to build out benefits for our community and find ways to make your life easier.
We’re honored that you’ve been with us on this journey so far and hope you’re as excited as we are for what’s next.
As always, we love hearing from our members and would be happy to answer any questions you might have regarding the announcement or your membership with us. Simply reach out to your COs via the app or drop us a line at hello@andco.nyc.
Woot! Woot!
Leif & Martin

excerpt.rendered: Fiverr Workspace joins Fiverr, the leading global marketplace for creative and digital services, giving freelancers the resources to thrive in today’s economy.
